de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate

Class AbstractImcEvaluationUnitIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.AbstractImcEvaluationUnitIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImcEvaluationUnit, ImEvaluationComponent<ImAttribute>, ImEvaluationUnit
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultImcEvaluationUnit

    public abstract class AbstractImcEvaluationUnitIetf
extends AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf
implements ImcEvaluationUnit
    Specialized base for an IMC evaluation unit. Especially important for inheritance. It has predefined methods to handle mandatory message attributes received from an IMV.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractImcEvaluationUnitIetf(GlobalHandshakeRetryListener globalHandshakeRetryListener)
      Creates the specialized base for an IMC evaluation unit with the given handshake retry listener.

      Evaluates a list of types, related to a component message.

      Handles an attribute request attribute and returns the requested attributes if possible.
      protected abstract List<? extends ImAttribute> handleError(PaAttributeValueError value, ImSessionContext context)
      Handles an error attribute and returns other attributes in response if needed.

      Handles a remediation instructions attribute and returns other attributes in response if needed.
      protected abstract List<? extends ImAttribute> handleResult(PaAttributeValueAssessmentResult value, ImSessionContext context)
      Handles a result attribute and returns other attributes in response if needed.

        public List<ImAttribute> handle(List<? extends ImAttribute> attribute,
                       ImSessionContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ImEvaluationComponent
        Evaluates a list of types, related to a component message. For the evaluation, it can take connection specific values from the context in to account.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface ImEvaluationComponent<ImAttribute>
        Parameters:
        attribute - a list of types, related to a component message
        context - the context, which holds connection specific values
        Returns:
        a list of results of the specific type
